ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard Revenge?)
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 7 playing my chords of dissonance and whacking on a gnoll a wizard a level higher than me tried to steal my kill but couldn t do it :)  He got mad
ygData.messageBody:
At level 7 playing my chords of dissonance and whacking on a gnoll a wizard
a level higher than me tried to steal my kill but couldn't do it :) He got
mad because my 'chords' were casting a spell on him. He tried to duel me -
I just ignored him.


> ----------
> From: James Schuldes[SMTP:jgs@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 2:26 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard Revenge?)
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> "hmm, I think I will try my chords of dissoannce song. have not used it
> since the guard whacked me. I wonder how all of the orc's will like it?
> oh
> my goodness they really don't like it! lots of them really don't like it!
> Help! help! help! I better run for the zone! no wait, there is that
> powerful caster maybe he will help me if I run over to him! Help! help!
> Please zap the dorcs off me help!"
>
> now can u mem your songs faster than he can mem his spells? course he was
> bound right across the zone and you were bound in the arena <oh well>
>
> now if you have an enchanter friend or a high level bard friend who can
> mez
> and memblur or charm... well that's another story - hehe love to see the
> evil killstealer casters burn that mana casting on a charmed mob <eg>
>
> Sylly
> Bard of the 18th level
> a.k.a. Robo-Bard
> waiting for the boats in ButcherBlock
> somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)
> [mailto:kblair@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 1:31 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard
> Revenge?)
>
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> And on a different subject and trying to keep it Bard
> related: What can a
> bard do (if anything) when he/she is being constantly robbed
> of his/her
> kills by magic users?
